--- In gladiator@y..., "oldschool518" <johnnyoldschool@e...> wrote:
> well, see, if it locks on, that either makes it magical or the 
archer 
> puts some mad english on it.. so mad that as to be impossible.. and 
i 
> would prefer to keep my archers at least not overtly magical.. or 
> something..

Hmm.  An arrow that flies straight at a target with incredible power. 
 That would be interesting.
 

Just a reminder notice: next week, we will discussing mages and 
barbarians.

* * *

After that, it's going to be onward to one of three things:

1)druids and clerics

2)skeletons, faeries, ghosts, and fire elementals

3)Golems, Giant Skeletons, and towers

When we get those three items, I plan on opening up room for 
discussion for new characters classes that are not promotions of 
existing characters or hybrid/dual class.

Then, I'll switch to archmages and orc captains.

After that, I'll open up for discussion that are promotions of 
existing characters.

Then, we'll have a discussion about the game issues of health and 
mana.

Once that is complete, then I'll open up discussion for the 
hybrid/dual class business.

Upon completion of discussion about the hybrid/dual class business, 
I'll move things onward to talking about game issues [complaints nad 
proposed solutions].

And, if you are wondering what we talk about after that, don't worry 
because we'll discuss ways to make Gladiator:Beyond Freedom really 
cool and easy to upgrade.

* * *

In ~ 3 hours, I'll have a birthday.
